name: FChaosDebugDrawColorsByClientServer
doc: Structure holding the settings using to debug draw Particles shape based on whether they are client or server objects (in PIE) Chaos Visual Debugger

ServerColor: Color used for server shapes that are not awake or sleeping dynamic
ServerDynamicColor: Color used for server shapes that are awake dynamic
ServerSleepingColor: Color used for server shapes that are sleeping dynamics
ClientColor: Color used for client shapes that are not awake or sleeping dynamic
ClientDynamicColor: Color used for server shapes that are awake dynamic
ClientSleepingColor: Color used for client shapes that are sleeping dynamics
